item.description:
"Very special dance as radio DJ Kirby from Shark radio 102.1 will be at the dance doing a call-in to the station. Join us and meet a very popular radio personality." Friday at Daniels Hall, Rt 4, Nottingham, NH., single people can meet and dance in a non threatening environment. Very inexpensive, no need to purchase expensive drinks or tip bartenders, bring your own liquor and enjoy a fun evening for singles over 30. Join us and maybe meet that special person. Safe place for women attending alone. Visit Daniels Hall for more info and directions or call 603 942-8525 for verbal directions.

Again, no need to buy expensive drinks or tip bartenders, just bring your own liquor, free drink set-ups and hot buffet are included in the $11 admission. Casual dress is a plus which puts people at ease and makes it easier to join in the fun atmosphere. This dance has been working it's magic for fourteen years. The dance is heavily advertised in order to ensure there are always new singles for you to meet.,

Dave McDermott
singles@worldpath.net
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where the meetup table is located.
item.name: Special Singles Dance with classic rock station 105.3 "The Shark".
